title: Ward Skins selection in Champ select
body: I think being able to change your ward skin before a game would be very useful to everyone, This could be a tab after/ next to champions and skins in the champion select. This should be relatively easy to implement and very useful to those who change ward skins regularly.

replies.body: I'd like this a lot actually.

I'm gonna be that guy, so feel free to hate on me.

>useful

It's not actually "useful" it doesn't do anything really.
It saves a little bit of time between each queue when you go to change your ward skin. It does do something.

Yes cause when i'm queuing, i find it takes 3 seconds to get into game.

Go into queue > Go to shop > Change ward

This can be done before most queues are popped.

Also no, ward skins (barring the bug in the game a few patches ago where skinless wards were massive) have no effect on the game, therefore it does nothing useful.

Oh so you are talking about the usefulness of skins in general rather than this feature. So you wouldn't mind if you had to do this with champion skins as well? (Equipping them via store that is.) I don't think you lose anything from having this feature as a skin hater.

Least it would mean i wouldn't forget to equip a champ skin when i buy it.

I'm just saying there is no point (though i'm a person who has stuck to the same ward skin and summoner icon for as long as i have had the ones i like.)
Players have been asking for this as long as ward skins have been a thing, don't know why Riot hasn't implemented it yet

Maybe the client can't handle it. I hope that isn't the case and they are just a little lazy. Another reason could be that they want to advertise the other ward skins when you go to change your own? They can just add that into the ward select area if that's the problem.
